reviews.review: Das Spiel ist Immer ne tolle Idee mit freunden zu spielen ist aber leider ein bisschen zu Gehirn fÃ¶rdernd und manche Level sind schwer, fÃ¼r ein Indie Game hat er sehr viel Content den man spielen kann. Die Story war auch spannend aber ein bisschen zu lang. Trotzdem ein super spiel

This game had me stuck a few times, but that is part of what makes this game so fun. You have to use what you've learned while playing through previous parts of the game. I would definitely play through Portal 1 first though as it takes place before Portal 2's story.
jan ist zu dumm um diese spiel zu spielen

This is my favourite game of all time, it has a very active modding scene and tons of levels made in the level creator it also has a great story and graphics. Some of the puzzles in the story while good were quite easy but it's still worth playing through. Excellent value for money.

I played this game all the way through on Xbox 360 around six times, then got the computer version here but never finished it. The witty, cleverly-written dialogue, beautiful graphics, story, lore, and puzzles NEVER get old. Please get it if you haven't already!!
